items.name: Adamantine Armor
items.type: Any Medium or Heavy, Except Hide Armor
items.description: This suit of armor is reinforced with adamantine, one of the hardest substances in existence. While you’re wearing it, any Critical Hit against you becomes a normal hit.

items.name: Animated Shield
items.description: While holding this Shield, you can take a Bonus Action to cause it to animate. The Shield leaps into the air and hovers in your space to protect you as if you were wielding it, leaving your hands free. items.name: Armor, +1, +2, or +3
items.description: You have a bonus to Armor Class while wearing this armor. The bonus is determined by its rarity.

items.name: Armor of Gleaming
items.description: This armor never gets dirty.

items.description: You have Resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The DM chooses the type or determines it randomly by rolling on the following table. Armor of resistance (Leather Armor), Armor of invulnerability (Plate Armor)

items.description: You gain a +2 bonus to Armor Class against ranged attack rolls while you wield this Shield. This bonus is in addition to the Shield’s normal bonus to AC. items.name: Cast-Off Armor
items.description: You can doff this armor as a Magic action.

items.name: Demon Armor
items.description: While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class, and you know Abyssal. items.name: Dragon Scale Mail
items.description: Dragon Scale Mail is made of the scales of one kind of dragon. Sometimes dragons collect their cast-off scales and gift them. items.name: Dwarven Plate
items.description: While wearing this armor, you gain a +2 bonus to Armor Class. In addition, if an effect moves you against your will along the ground, you can take a Reaction to reduce the distance you are moved by up to 10 feet.

items.name: Efreeti Chain
items.description: While wearing this armor, you gain a +3 bonus to Armor Class, you have Immunity to Fire damage, and you know Primordial. In addition, you can stand on and move across molten rock as if it were solid ground.

items.name: Elven Chain
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class while you wear this armor. You are considered trained with this armor even if you lack training with Medium or Heavy armor.

items.name: Enspelled Armor
items.description: Bound into this armor is a spell of level 8 or lower. The spell is determined when the armor is created and must belong to the Abjuration or Illusion school of magic. items.name: Glamoured Studded Leather
items.description: While wearing this armor, you gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class. You can also take a Bonus Action to cause the armor to assume the appearance of a normal set of clothing or some other kind of armor. items.name: Mariner’s Armor
items.description: While wearing this armor, you have a Swim Speed equal to your Speed. In addition, if you start your turn underwater with 0 Hit Points, you immediately regain 1d4 Hit Points. The armor can’t heal anyone again until the next dawn. The armor is decorated with fish and shell motifs.

items.name: Mithral Armor
items.type: Any Medium or Heavy, Except Hide Armor
items.description: Mithral is a light, flexible metal. Armor made of this substance can be worn under normal clothes. If the armor normally imposes Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks or has a Strength requirement, the mithral version of the armor doesn’t.

items.name: Plate Armor of Etherealness
items.type: Half Plate Armor or Plate Armor
items.description: While you’re wearing this armor, you can take a Magic action and use a command word to gain the effect of the Etherealness spell. The spell ends immediately if you remove the armor or take a Magic action to repeat the command word. This property of the armor can’t be used again until the next...

items.name: Sentinel Shield
items.description: While holding this Shield, you have Advantage on Initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks. The Shield is emblazoned with a symbol of an eye.

items.name: Shield, +1, +2, or +3
items.description: While holding this Shield, you have a bonus to Armor Class determined by the Shield’s rarity, in addition to the Shield’s normal bonus to AC.

items.name: Shield of Expression
items.description: The front of this Shield is shaped in the likeness of a face. While bearing the Shield, you can take a Bonus Action to alter the face’s expression.

items.name: Shield of Missile Attraction
items.description: While holding this Shield, you have Resistance to damage from attacks made with Ranged weapons. Curse. This Shield is cursed. items.description: While holding this Shield, you have a +2 bonus to Armor Class. This bonus is in addition to the Shield’s normal bonus to AC. items.name: Smoldering Armor
items.description: Wisps of harmless, odorless smoke rise from this armor while it is worn.

items.name: Spellguard Shield
items.description: While holding this Shield, you have Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and spell attack rolls have Disadvantage against you. Spell Scroll Scroll, Rarity Varies
